headline.main: PRODUCTION POOL ON PLANES FORMED; 8 Major Aircraft Concerns in East Organize War Council to Speed Their Output HEADED BY G.W. VAUGHAN. Exchange of Engineering Data, Facilities, Materials and Personnel Planned

lead_paragraph: A nonprofit corporation designed to speed up and increase production of American aircraft by the pooling of manufacturing resources and the coordination of efforts was formed here yesterday by eight major airplane manufacturing companies of the East Coast.
abstract: Aircraft War Production Council, East Coast, to pool mfg resources and efforts of 8 major cos

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: AIRCRAFT WAR PRODUCTION COUNCIL, EAST COAST, INC.
